library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(DT)

```{r}
# Read in all of the raw data
survey <- read_csv("raw/master_survey_resp.csv")
```
Question label

1. Country
2. Community Name
3. Gender of Interviewed


4. In the last 12 months, what fishing gear have you used?
```{r}
q4_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("gear")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q4_sum<-survey %>% 
  mutate(gear_buceo = ifelse(grepl("Buceo", other_gear), 1, 0)) %>% 
  select(starts_with("gear")) %>% 
  summarise_all(sum, na.rm = TRUE)
```


Other

5. For fishing purposes, do you own a boat, share a boat, or rent a boat from others, or do not use a boat?
```{r}
q5_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_status")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q5_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_status")) %>% 
  group_by(boat_status) %>% 
  count()
```

6. For your primary fishing vessel, please describe the boat in the following aspects:

a. Length
```{r}
q6a_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_length")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q6a_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_length")) %>% 
  group_by(boat_length_m) %>% 
  count()
```

b. Material
```{r}
q6b_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_material")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q6b_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_material")) %>% 
  group_by(boat_material) %>% 
  count()
```

c. Is the boat motorized
```{r}
q6c_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_motorized")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q6c_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_motorized")) %>% 
  group_by("boat_motorized") %>% 
  count()
```

d. Is there an onboard power/ electricity source?
```{r}
q6d_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_power")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q6d_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("boat_power")) %>% 
  group_by(boat_power) %>% 
  count()
```

7. Please check all the types of technology that you use at least once a week, if any
```{r}
unique(unlist(strsplit(as.character(survey$other_tech), ",")))

q7_response<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("tech")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  nrow()

q7_sum<-survey %>% 
  select(starts_with("tech")) %>% 
  summarise_all(sum, na.rm = TRUE)
```
